title: Pogačar and UAE Might Dominate 2025 like Peak Team Sky, but That’s Fine by Me (For Now)
content:
Vingegaard narrowly prevented a UAE grand slam last week, but peloton prankster Pogačar and his kindergarten of future crushers made the dominance somehow 'acceptable.'

Read the full article at Pogačar and UAE Might Dominate 2025 like Peak Team Sky, but That’s Fine by Me (For Now) on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
